mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into presentation (team_id, score, report_score, seating_order, seminard, `time`, material_filename, material_url, report_filename, report_url) values (#{teamId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{score,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{reportScore,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{seatingOrder,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{seminard,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{materialFilename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{materialUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportFilename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update presentation set team_id = #{teamId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, score = #{score,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, report_score = #{reportScore,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, seating_order = #{seatingOrder,jdbcType=TINYINT}, seminard = #{seminard,jdbcType=TINYINT}, `time` = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, material_filename = #{materialFilename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, material_url = #{materialUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, report_filename = #{reportFilename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, report_url = #{reportUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, team_id, score, report_score, seating_order, seminard, `time`, material_filename, material_url, report_filename, report_url from presentation where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, team_id, score, report_score, seating_order, seminard, `time`, material_filename, material_url, report_filename, report_url from presentation
